title: 1 Bedroom Apartment in Downtown Loop - Sublet
posting_body: ['I’m looking for someone to take over the remainder of my lease in a 1 bed/1 bath apartment in downtown loop area.', 'The apartment overlooks the river facing west with beautiful sunsets.', 'The space is about 650sq ft and has an open living area.', 'Also has a full washer and dryer in the unit.', 'The rent is $1760 plus $95 for utilities each month (total $1855/month).', 'The utilities cover water, trash, and internet.', 'Electric is separate and is about $35/month.', 'There’s also heated garage parking or outdoor lot parking for a separate fee as well.', 'The building has security 24/7 with fob entry to the apartments and has been very safe.', 'The building also has a locked package room and full gym with free weights, yoga studio, and small indoor track with turf.', 'There’s also a rooftop patio, grills, and a convenience store within the building.', 'I also included a photo inside the building as it’s quite unique.', 'I need to relocate for work but my lease doesn’t end until January 4, 2023 and I’m looking for a subletter for the space!', 'Move in could be anytime but hopefully before July 1st!', 'Read Less']
